## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Motivation
Why do you want this feature? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case
Provide a specific example of how you would use this feature.

## Implementation Ideas
If you have ideas about how to implement this, share them here.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or examples about the feature request.

## Checklist
- [ ] I have searched existing feature requests
- [ ] This feature aligns with the project goals
- [ ] I am willing to help implement this feature
